whyToTrain.label: Why training?
cards: For a month of training at the terminal you will not lose real money and you will receive experience that could be gained over the years
Acquire analytical skills and learn how to make informed decisions
Built-in risk management will help to form the right skill
Hints and a user-friendly interface will allow even a beginner to master trading
You can quickly test trading strategies
Opportunity to check the effectiveness of a new employee for a prop company
Rewind trading functionality in time allows faster acquire relevant skills and learn to understand the market
Having mastered the skills of trading on the terminal, you can move on to real trading without fear and start earning income

plans.label: Our plans
plans.headerText: Get 1,000,000 virtual currency to the emulator

beginner.label: I am new to the topic of cryptocurrency. Can I figure it out?
beginner.text: The terminal works with the 50 most popular coins on the Binance platform. Binance is the world's largest crypto exchange and its top 50 coins include Bitcoin (BTC), Ethereum (ETH), Ripple (XRP), Litecoin (LTC) and other popular cryptocurrencies. Practicing on our top 50 Binance terminal will help you acquire the most relevant skills and move on to real trading.

footer.label: Go to the terminal and dive into the crypto market without losing money.

welcomeScreen.label: Get up-to-date knowledge about cryptocurrency with practice at our terminal
welcomeScreen.description: Full immersion in the world of cryptocurrency for beginners and analysis of difficult topics for more experienced listeners. Only relevant knowledge from real practitioners and creators of the crypto exchange emulator.

advantageCards.modules: Possibility to purchase only modules of interest
advantageCards.systems: No need to write a summary, there is a convenient system of ready-made materials
advantageCards.videoLesson: Not boring video tutorials diluted with author's memes

courseExplanationCard.heading: What awaits you on the course?

cardText.ourCourse: Our course will help you gain knowledge about cryptocurrency for Investing and trading on stock exchanges.
cardText.inAddition: In addition to trading, we cover general issues on the operation of wallets, tell you how to store and buy cryptocurrency, and analyze the psychological aspects of trading.
cardText.avoidMistakes: We know why many lose money and will help to avoid mistakes, like most novice traders.
cardText.weExplain: We explain everything complex in simple words using memes, so that the training is interesting and even a beginner can figure it out.

creatorsTeamInfo.heading: We are the team of creators of the educational cryptocurrency exchange Terminal.
text: A few years ago we decided to dive in earnings on cryptocurrency. We ourselves started from scratch, that's why we understand what beginners face and what mistakes they do.

Having absorbed a ton of information, studied many courses, most of which turned out to be useless and outdated, spending a lot of time and money on practical training. Based on this, we have collected really useful information that will be understandable and safe for everyone.
This is how the idea of our author's training with an emphasis on practice and exclusively up-to-date information that will lead you to earn money on cryptocurrency.

beginners.label: Beginners
beginners.text: Who do not know anything about cryptocurrency, but want to learn how to make transactions in the market without losing real money.

relocants.label: For those who want to live in another country
relocants.text: Who want to have a remote source of income independent of from the country.

entrepreneurs.label: Entrepreneurs and freelancers
entrepreneurs.text: Who want to cooperate with international organizations, you will learn how to accept payment for your goods and services in the crypt, you will find an additional source of income, thanks to trading.

traders.label: Traders
traders.text: Who are already trading, but not able to earn They feel that they lack knowledge and experience. We will help you get rid of mistakes and master the missing trading skills so that you reach a new level of income.

propCompanies.label: Prop-companies
propCompanies.text: Who want to be able to quickly test trading strategies, quickly check and train employees.

practiceBadge.heading: Move from theory to practice without losing real money
practiceBadge.description: We have developed a complete platform for you, where you can train and earn.

advantagesCard.heading: What do you eventually get
advantagesCard.getPractice: Get practice on the real Terminal to develop real skills
advantagesCard.exchangeCrypto: You can buy freely and sell cryptocurrency
advantagesCard.whatCourseDepends: You will understand what the course depends on and in what periods are better to transact
advantagesCard.payNAcceptPayments: Learn how to pay for goods and accept payment for your services in cryptocurrency
advantagesCard.tradingStrategies: Understand trading strategies and you can make your own
advantagesCard.gainKnowledge: Gain knowledge gained through long practice not just another course with outdated theory
advantagesCard.reliableExchanges: Do you know which exchanges reliable and which are not.
advantagesCard.incomeLevel: Can you get out to a new level of income
advantagesCard.psychologicalAspects: Be aware of psychological aspects of trading and you won't get caught on the tricks of thinking
advantagesCard.protectCrypto: You will know how to protect your crypto wallet from fraudulent schemes

first.label: Point 'A'
first.text: The desire to find a new source of income and start earning on a new business.

second.label: Point 'A'
second.text: The desire to find a new source of income and start earning on a new business.

first.heading: Introductory course
first.description: Learn what cryptocurrency is, how to use it, why its price changes, how the exchange works and how the market works.
first.contents: What is blockchain, tokens, market cycles, order book, types of orders, candlestick chart, whales and hamsters, how our terminal works.

second.heading: Trading education with homework
second.description: The use of various trading tools, the ability to start trading with real money, create your own strategies.
second.contents: What are technical analysis, trends, levels, graphical models, volumes, trading psychology, risk and money management, creation of trading strategies, security when trading real money, storage and transfer of cryptocurrency, interfaces of various exchanges.

third.heading: Joint trade and further education
third.description: Get more hands-on experience, apply more advanced tools and create more complex trading strategies.
third.contents: What are indicators, cluster analysis, eliot waves, analysis of psychological traps, quarterly futures, strategies for futures, hedging, grid trading, margin trading in the spot market, making more advanced strategies,

trainingQuestion.label: How will the training take place?
trainingQuestion.text: The training terminal is a service developed by us for fast, safe and effective training in trading. The terminal system behaves like a real exchange, allowing you to safely learn how to trade with cryptocurrency and gain trading experience. The terminal works with the 50 most popular coins on the Binance platform. Practicing on our top 50 Binance terminal will help you acquire the most relevant skills and move on to real trading.
